publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1202 Cathy Jamieson: Civil Partnership Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of giving same sex couples in Scotland the opportunity to form a civil partnership and agrees that the provisions in the Civil Partnership Bill that relate to devolved matters should be based on Scots law and considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-1202 Cathy Jamieson: Civil Partnership Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of giving same sex couples in Scotland the opportunity to form a civil partnership and agrees that the provisions in the Civil Partnership Bill that relate to devolved matters should be based on Scots law and considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry

S2M-1202 Cathy Jamieson: Civil Partnership Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of giving same sex couples in Scotland the opportunity to form a civil partnership and agrees that the provisions in the Civil Partnership Bill that relate to devolved matters should be based on Scots law and considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Hugh Henry
